withlogo.name: Barrel

withlogo.name: DockerAnalyser

withlogo.name: DockerFinder

withlogo.name: EdgeUsher
withlogo.description: A declarative prototype to solve the VNF placement in Cloud-Edge scenarios.

withlogo.name: FogBrain
withlogo.description: continuous reasoning for managing next-gen distributed applications

withlogo.name: FogMon

withlogo.name: FogTorchPI

withlogo.name: TosKer

withoutlogo.name: DrACO

withoutlogo.name: PASA
